amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress regarding the compliance with child and spousal support obligations by United Nations personnel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit payment of U.S. arrearages to the UN until the UN complies with requirments that UN employees comply with child and spousal support orders issued by U.S. courts.
